genresAdvancedInfo.name: bahamian folk
genresAdvancedInfo.description: Bahamian folk music is the traditional music of the Bahamas, characterized by its use of indigenous instruments such as the goombay drum, saw, and conch shell. The lyrics often reflect the struggles and joys of everyday life in the archipelago, with themes ranging from love and romance to political and social commentary.
